page.title: 14Farm Machinery
page.content: When we went to the farm we saw a combine harvester. It works by cutting the corn and forces it into the drum inside the combine which spins round very quickly and separates the corn seed and the straw. Then the grain comes out of a tube at the side of the combine into the trailer. We were amazed at the size of the combine harvester and how high up it is sitting on the seat. We have also seen the sprayer and the seed drill. This is how the sprayer works: first the fertiliser is poured into it. Then it is blown around by a large fan. The fertiliser shoots out of pipes onto the crops. Tis is how the seed drill works: you put the sed in, then fasten the drill to a tractor. As you drive along the field the seeds fall down pipes into the soil.
